ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the Signs of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: These are the verses of the illuminating Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the verses of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: These are the verses of the illustrious Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are verses of the clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These are the Ayat of the manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are the verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are the signs of the Manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: These are revelations of the Scripture that maketh plain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: These are verses from the Book that makes things clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are verses of the Manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: These are the signs of the Manifest Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are Verses of the Book that makes (things) clear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: These are Verses of the manifest Book (that makes clear truth from falsehood, good from evil, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those are the verses of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These are the Verses of the Clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: These are the verses of the clear Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:2] Those, namely, these signs, are the signs of the Manifest Book (the genitive annexation conveys the [partitive] sense of min, ‘of’ [‘verses from the Manifest Book’]), [the Manifest Book] which reveals truth from falsehood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (These are revelations of the Scripture that maketh plain) this surah consists of Qur'anic verses which make plain the lawful and the unlawful, the commands and prohibitions.
